means: 通过继承得到的，遗传的
继承( inherit的过去式和过去分词 )
经遗传获得（品质、身体特征等）接替（责任等），继任

sentence.Network_en: Harry inherited the house and a sizeable chunk of land.
sentence.Network_cn: 哈里继承了这座房子以及相当大的一片土地。

sentence.Network_en: The government inherited an impossible situation from its predecessors.
sentence.Network_cn: 这届政府从前任那里接过了一个非常棘手的烂摊子。

sentence.Network_en: His mother inherited a farm worth 15,000 dollars a year.
sentence.Network_cn: 他母亲继承了一处年产值为1.5万美元的农场。

细胞质遗传(cytoplasmic inheritance)也称核外遗传（extranuclear inheritance) 是指由细胞质(核外)的遗传物质所控.

entry.def: If you inherit money or property, you receive it from someone who has died.

example.ex: He has no son to inherit his land.
example.tran: 他没有儿子来继承田产。

example.ex: ...paintings that he inherited from his father.
example.tran: 他从父亲那里继承来的油画

entry.def: If you inherit something such as a task, problem, or attitude, you get it from the people who used to have it, for example because you have taken over their job or been influenced by them.

example.ex: The government inherited an impossible situation from its predecessors...
example.tran: 这届政府从前任那里接过了一个非常棘手的烂摊子。

example.ex: Our legal system inherited laws from the English system.
example.tran: 我们的司法体系沿袭了英国的法律体系。

entry.tran: 经遗传获得(特征、特质等)
entry.def: If you inherit a characteristic or quality, you are born with it, because your parents or ancestors also had it.

example.ex: We inherit from our parents many of our physical characteristics...
example.tran: 我们的许多身体特征都是从父母那里遗传而来的。

example.ex: Her children have inherited her love of sport...
example.tran: 她的孩子们继承了她对运动的热爱。

means.word_mean: 1. tending to occur among members of a family usually by heredity;

Sentence.sentence: Her father died when she was 21 and she inherited 7.
She inherited a big fortune from her father

The result could be a group of young people that, like their boomer (二战后生育高峰期出生的美国人) parents, grows up with a strong sense of purpose and sheds the image of apathy (冷漠) they've inherited from Generation X (60 .代后期和70 .代出生的美国人).

means.word_mean: 通过继承得到的,遗传的

sentences.en: How many of these traits are genetically inherited?
sentences.cn: 这些特征有多少是遗传的？

sentences.en: We do not know which behavioural traits are inherited and which acquired.
sentences.cn: 我们不知道哪些行为特征是遗传的，哪些是后天养成的。

sentences.en: From this study we can reasonably infer that this behaviour is inherited.
sentences.cn: 根据这项研究我们可以合理地推断出这种行为是遗传的。
